1. Worthy Wine Works Los Angeles Contemporary Archive, East of BorneoLos Angeles Contemporary Archive's natural wine fundraiser.

2. Movie Nights at Divison Place Movie series screening independently made films from and adjacent to Southeast Asia

3. Protocols Online journal featuring provocative art and writing from across the global Jewish diaspora

4. Community Reading Group Critical Reading and Study Gathering

5. Because We've Read Radical Int'l Bookclub.

Joy / Jade designs and codes for organizers, collectives, artists, publications, and projects invested in abolition, critical inquiry, art, and something more sustainable.

She lives and climbs in Los Angeles.

Reach me @ info@joy-jade.com

Endnotes: This site was designed and built from scratch in 2019 by yours truly. Updated in 2022 | The typefaces? Plain-old Arial Narrow. And Miller Italic | Most of the photography credit belongs to others, with the exception of a few art direction projects (Daily Harvest + Brilliant) | BWR was built by Adlai | Original Protocols website was built by Adam Berman | Otherwise I designed and developed projects 00-04!
